A0: the red-carpeted Mediterranean opulence of the Croisette
RelatedSentence: What it may have lacked in glittering VIP premieres and champagne - fuelled yacht parties , FiSahara made up for in spades with dune parties , camel races and multiplex-sized screenings beneath the stars .
